are-you-sure-to-close: Are you sure you want to close?

notifications.recording-ended-with-error: The recording ended with an error.
notifications.rtmp-ended-with-error: The live stream ended with an error.
notifications.file-type-not-allow: The file type '{{filetype}}' is not allowed.
notifications.max-file-size-exceeds: The file is larger than the maximum allowed size of {{size}}MB.
notifications.you-have-removed: You have been removed from the meeting.
notifications.you-are-blocked: You are not allowed to join this meeting.
notifications.you-have-reject: Your request to join the meeting was denied.
notifications.waiting-for-approval: Please wait for a moderator to let you in.
notifications.room-disconnected-unknown: You have been disconnected for an unknown reason. (Code: {{code}})
notifications.room-disconnected-client-initiated: You have disconnected from the meeting. (Code: {{code}})
notifications.room-disconnected-duplicate-entry: Someone else has joined with the same user ID.
notifications.room-disconnected-server-shutdown: The meeting server has shut down. (Code: {{code}})
notifications.room-disconnected-participant-removed: You have been removed from the meeting.
notifications.room-disconnected-state-mismatch: A connection error occurred. Please try rejoining. (Code: {{code}})
notifications.room-disconnected-network-error: You were disconnected due to a network problem.
notifications.your-connection-quality-lost: Your connection to the meeting has been lost.
notifications.need-to-disable-display-external-link: To play a video, please stop sharing the external link first.
notifications.need-to-disable-external-media-player: To share an external link, please stop the video player first.
notifications.websocket-not-connected: You are not connected. Messages cannot be sent.
notifications.room-will-end-in: This meeting will end in {{minutes}} minutes.
notifications.e2ee-unsupported-browser-msg: This meeting uses security features that your browser does not support. Please try a different browser like Chrome or Firefox.
notifications.e2ee-invalid-key-msg: The security key you entered is incorrect.
notifications.e2ee-empty-key-msg: The security key cannot be empty.
notifications.nats-error-no-response: Could not connect to the server. Please try again later. (Error: {{error}})
notifications.nats-error-timeout: The server is not responding. Please try again later. (Error: {{error}})
notifications.nats-error-request-failed: Your request could not be sent.
notifications.decode-error-body: There was a problem receiving data from the server.
notifications.nats-error-auth-body: We were not able to verify your information. Your session may have expired.
notifications.media-server-disconnected-reconnecting: Lost connection to the media server. Reconnecting...
notifications.preloaded-whiteboard-file-processing-err: There was an error loading the whiteboard file.
notifications.max-num-participates-exceeded: The meeting is full. You cannot join at this time.
notifications.ending-session: The meeting is ending, please wait...
notifications.whiteboard-other-task-to-finish: The whiteboard is preparing new content. Please wait.
notifications.cloud-recording-not-supported-self-key: Cloud recording is not available when using a custom security key.
notifications.media-only-recording-not-support-e2ee: Recording only audio and video is not available when end-to-end encryption is enabled.
notifications.you-are-sharing-screen: You're sharing your screen now. Others will see a larger view.
notifications.new-system-message-in-chat: A new system message has been posted in the public chat.

room-metadata.session-not-recording: This meeting is no longer being recorded.
room-metadata.rtmp-started: This meeting is now being live-streamed.
room-metadata.rtmp-stopped: This meeting is no longer being live-streamed.

alert.logout: You are about to leave the meeting.
alert.end: You are about to end the meeting for everyone.

app.how-to-join: How would you like to join?
app.token-missing-des: An access token is required to join.
app.require-ssl-des: A secure (SSL) connection is required to use this service.
app.insert-secret-help: For this secure meeting, everyone must use the same Security Key. If it doesn't match, you won't be able to connect. Please get the correct Security Key from the meeting organizer.

notice.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
notice.applied-new-setting: New lock settings have been applied.
notice.want-to-block: Do you want to block this user?

right-panel.file-upload-default-error: There was an error uploading the file.
right-panel.chat-box-placeholder: Send a message, paste an image, or drop a file here (New line: Shift + Enter)

icons.how-to-record: How would you like to record?
icons.recording-types-des: Choose how to record the session. 'Full Screen' saves the entire meeting layout to the cloud. 'Media Only' saves just the audio, video, and screen shares to the cloud. 'Record to Your Computer' saves the recording directly to your device (for best results, please use Google Chrome).

notice.already-active-screen-sharing: Someone is already sharing their screen.
notice.recording-not-start: The recording could not be started.
notice.recording-did-not-stop: The recording could not be stopped.
notice.applied-settings: New lock settings have been applied.
notice.rtmp-starting: Live stream is starting. Please wait.
notice.rtmp-ending: Live stream is ending. Please wait.
notice.external-media-player-url-invalid: The URL is not valid or supported.
notice.external-media-player-starting: Preparing video for playback, please wait.

modal.rtmp-close-confirm: Are you sure you want to end the live stream?
modal.rtmp-close-msg: You are about to stop the live stream.
modal.external-media-player-select-file: Select a media file to upload

whiteboard.converting: Please wait, the file is being converted.
whiteboard.drag-drop-file: Drag and drop your file to upload

waiting-room.updated-msg: The waiting room message has been updated.
waiting-room.no-pending-user: There is no one waiting to join.

breakout-room.invitation-msg: You have been invited to join a breakout room.
breakout-room.need-one-user: At least one person must be in each breakout room.
breakout-room.open-tab-error: Could not open the link in a new tab.
breakout-room.duration-extended: Time has been added to the breakout rooms.
breakout-room.broadcast-msg-success: Your message has been sent to all breakout rooms.
breakout-room.you-pushed-user: A join notification has been sent to {{name}}.

landing.join-prompt: Enable your microphone and camera to participate fully, or join as a listener.

external-display-link-display.note: Note: Make sure the website allows being embedded. Not all websites will work.
external-display-link-display.name: Name

speech-services.speech-user-required: At least one user must be selected to transcribe.
speech-services.speech-lang-required: At least one spoken language must be selected.
speech-services.translation-lang-required: At least one language must be selected for translation.
speech-services.status-change-error: Something went wrong. Please try again. (Error: {{error}})
speech-services.speech-to-text-ready: Transcription has started. You can begin speaking.
speech-services.already-received-token: You have recently requested a token. Please wait 5 minutes before trying again.
speech-services.already-using-service: You are already using this service.
speech-services.renew-need-already-using-service: Only the person who started the service can renew the token.
speech-services.renew-subscription-key-not-found: Could not find the subscription key to renew.
speech-services.service-disabled: This service is disabled. Please check the server configuration.
speech-services.token-generation-failed: Could not generate a token. Error: {{error}}
speech-services.mic-error: The service can't start due to a microphone problem.
speech-services.enable-translation-warning: You have selected more than one spoken language, but translation is disabled.
